rules:
    parameters-dns-friendly:
        severity: error
        description: Identifier parameter missing DNS-friendly pattern, e.g. ^[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?$
        given: $..parameters[?((@.name || '').match(/^id[ -_A-Z]|[ -_]id$|[a-z0-9]Id$/))]
            field: schema.pattern
            function: truthy
